lines.text: Unless the Japanese can be stopped, it will be impossible for any of your 42 wounded sailors to escape.
An air raid, Doctor. There's no cause for panic. You all know the rules. Convalescent patients to the shelter. All others are to be placed beneath their cots, Doctor.
Only those who are able to walk can go. All stretcher cases must stay here.
Let me see that, Cory. Well, that dry docks me, doesn't it?
You must choose the men you are taking, Doctor.
